name: Solitary mark
description: this is a casual puzzle game that is very simple and easy to understand, suitable for players of all ages. Players need to eliminate blocks of the same color or shape by clicking on them, or swap positions to connect them into three or more patterns. Each elimination earns points, and special items can also be used. The game interface is simple and beautiful, with smooth operation, exquisite graphics, and cheerful music, but it will not make you feel tired while you are crazy.
